casebody.data:
Edie BRITMAN, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Frank SAURO, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Budd Larner, PC, Defendant/Intervenor-Petitioner. Edie Britman, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Frank Sauro, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Budd Larner, PC, Defendant/Intervenor-Petitioner. C-926 September Term 2018
082589 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JUNE 3, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2979/3659-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
